title: Fish Finder
description: This social media app was my capstone project at UofSC, Using Kotlin and android studio as well as firebase, our team made an app designed to get you posting and sharing about all your favorite fishing spots! It came including a messaging feature designed by me as well as tons of other fun things to play around with including GPS!

title: Personal Website
description: This is the website you are on right now! The accumulation of all of my web development skills so far! It was made in congruency with my CSCE 242 class and will continue to be expanded as I go!
